translation.Preencha o campo de confirmação de senha: Fill in the password confirmation field!
translation.A senha deve ter pelo menos 6 caracteres: The password must be at least 6 characters long!
translation.Preencher o campo de data de nascimento!: Fill in the date of birth field!
translation.Por questões de segurança, senha deve te: For security reasons, the password must be at least 6 characters long.
translation.Parabéns, sua conta foi criada com suces: Congratulations, your account has been successfully created, now you can explore all events in Mozambique!
translation.Hey, selecione uma ou mais categorias, a: Hey, select one or more categories, so you will receive the best Suggestions!
translation.Ainda não tem eventos com gostos: You don't have events with likes yet
translation.'Curta' um evento e encontre-o mais tard: 'Like' an event and find it later, receive notifications and help us improve recommendations for you
translation.Ainda não seguiu nenhum organizador: You haven't followed any organizers yet
translation.'Siga' um organizador e assim sempre ser: 'Follow' an organizer and you will always be notified about the events of your favorite organizers

translation.Tem certeza que deseja sair: Are you sure you want to log out
translation.Bem-vindo aos Termos de Serviço do Aplic: Welcome to the Terms of Service of the Onde App! These terms govern the use of our mobile application, which aims to explore events and places in Mozambique. By using our application, you agree to these terms.
translation.Ao utilizar o aplicativo Onde, você conc: By using the Onde application, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of the terms presented here, please do not use the application.
translation.O aplicativo Onde oferece aos usuários a: The Onde application offers users the opportunity to explore events and places in Mozambique. This includes information about cultural events, social activities, tourist spots, among others.
translation.Para utilizar todas as funcionalidades d: To use all the features of the application, you may need to create a user account. By doing so, you agree to provide true, accurate, up-to-date and complete information about yourself as requested by the registration form. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account and for all activities that occur in your account.
translation.O aplicativo Onde e seu conteúdo, recurs: The Onde application and its content, features and functionality are owned by Onde and are protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws. You agree not to reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works, display, perform, publish, license or sell any content or information contained in the application.
translation.Em nenhuma circunstância a Onde, seus af: In no event shall Onde, its affiliates, licensors, service providers, employees, agents, directors or administrators be liable for any damages of any kind, under any legal theory, arising out of or related to the use or inability to use the application, or any content or information available in the application.
translation.Modificações nos Termos de Serviço: Modifications to the Terms of Service
translation.A Onde se reserva o direito de modificar: Onde reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Onde will notify users of any significant changes through the application. Continued use of the application after notification of changes to the terms will constitute acceptance of the new terms.
translation.Ao utilizar o aplicativo Onde, você conc: By using the Onde application, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. Failure to comply with these terms may result in the suspension or termination of your access to the application. If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us. Thank you for choosing the Onde application to explore events and places in Mozambique!
By using the Onde application, you agree not to:
translation.Violar qualquer lei local, estadual, nac: Violate any local, state, national or international law
translation.Usar o aplicativo para fins ilegais: Use the application for illegal purposes
translation.Interferir ou prejudicar a segurança do: Interfere with or harm the security of the application or any service, hardware system or network connected to the application
translation.Tem certeza que deseja deletar a conta e: Are you sure you want to delete the account and your data
translation.e não sabe o que fazer? Aqui você encont: and don't know what to do? Here you will find the best events to participate
and don't know what to do? Here you will find the best places to visit
translation.Descobrindo Moçambique através de experi: Discovering Mozambique through unforgettable experiences and incredible places
translation.A ONDE é uma plataforma digital que cone: ONDE is a digital platform that connects people to unforgettable experiences and incredible places in Mozambique. Through our platform, travelers can discover and book unique experiences, from cultural events and festivals to sightseeing and outdoor activities. Our mission is to help travelers explore the best that Mozambique has to offer, while supporting local communities and promoting sustainable tourism in the country
translation.Faça o download do nosso aplicativo móve: Download our mobile app to discover the best experiences in Mozambique, wherever you are. With our app, you can explore events, places and activities across the country, book tickets and receive real-time updates on events and special offers. Don't miss the opportunity to discover the best of Mozambique with ONDE!
translation.Aproveite o maior mercado de eventos do: Leverage the world's largest event marketplace and reach more consumers looking for events like yours with our industry-leading event marketing tools. Ready to bring your next event to life
translation.A nossa equipa de especialistas está pro: Our team of experts is ready to help your business grow. Contact us to learn more about our event marketing solutions
translation.Encontre a melhor solução para o seu neg: Find the best solution for your business with ONDE
